title: Digital Security Fundamentals: Understanding and Preventing Computer Viruses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and experience using the internet
context.additional_context: Need for effective video-based learning design in smartphone-centric restricted technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more major types of computer viruses and their infection routes.
Learners can apply five practical methods to prevent virus infections on smartphones/PCs.
Learners can reconfirm core security concepts with an 80% or higher accuracy rate in assessments after one month.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
